text: Oneworld (marketed as oneworld) is an airline alliance. It was founded in 1999. As of October 2017, Oneworld is the third-largest global alliance. It carried more than 527.9 million passengers, behind SkyTeam (630 million) and Star Alliance (762 million). Its headquarters are in New York City, United States. Its slogan is, "An alliance of the world's leading airlines working as one." ==Members== Member airline Joined American Airlines Alaska Airlines 31 March 2021 British Airways Cathay Pacific Finnair Iberia Japan Airlines LAN Airlines Malaysia Airlines Mexicana de Aviacion Qantas Qatar Airways Royal Jordanian S7 Airlines SriLankan Airlines Founding member Inactive member since August 2010. ==Past members== * Aer Lingus * Canadian Airlines * MALÃ‰V Hungarian Airlines * US Airways ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Airline alliances
title: Oneworld
